jekyll

jekyll 静态博客搭建

Posted by Q&H Blog on January 4, 2018
  • jekyll+github搭建个人博客
  • 写博客当中git 使用

jekyll+github搭建个人博客

  • 官网下载install ruby

  • install jekyllgem install jekylll

  • RubyGems

  • RubyKit

  • theme

    clone theme program: https://github.com/Gaohaoyang/gaohaoyang.github.io

    solve: gem install jekyll-paginate

写博客当中git 使用

  • commit file

    $ git add .

    $ git commit -a -m “v0.0.1 first commit”

    $ git push origin master

    $ git config –global user.email “**”

    $ git config –global user.name “**”

    $ git commit -a -m “-v0.0.0.1 change info”
